channel.title: Decerpo [639]
channel.description:
Hey guys, Over these past few weeks Sam, Kevin, and I have been working on a new server. Decerpo has been coming out great and we are proud to announce the ALPHA beta for the server. Of course this is the beginning stages of the server and there are a few bugs here and there but the server becomes more stable by the day. The server is run on mySql and is fully integrated with the Decerpo forums for easy donating/voting and more. Now lets get to the features. 95% Nex, animation/graphics working. 85% Summoning, Beast of Burden and healing. Whip/Dark Bow Coloring System Gambling/Dicing Dungeoneering System Custom Skill Selection Task System 70% Hunting 100% Slayer/Runecrafting (Pouches)/Herblore/Fishing/Agility/Fletching/ Woodcutting/Firemaking/Smithing/Mining/etc. Custom wyrm system Full Bork/Rammernaut/Tormented Demons/Corp. 100% Clan chat with coin share/loot share Fully working bone crushing. Castle Wars and Duel Arena fully working. No glitches. All trade dupes/glitches fixed. All magic animations and graphics. Perfect hybriding and combat. Fully working gravestones. Brand new skillcape buying system, never before seen. 15% Grand Exchange Full Korasi special. Working godsword assembly system. Working teleport tabs. _____________________________________________________________ [u]Feature that are coming to Decerpo[/u] Summoning specials/scrolls/pouch creating. Fully working Nex with minion spawning and battle crys. PvP rank system and random drop generator toggle on/off Experience locking/unlocking. Nomad Dungeoneering complexity system. New map data and item dumps. Stability of shops and economy. Price adjustments. And much more. _____________________________________________________________ [u]Picture Time[/u] *Beast of Burden [img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/6936/b552485613f1482eb8ca1a1.png[/img] *Rammernaut and Korasi Special [img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/8527/e8715e9615e046bb96881ad.png[/img] *Nex [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/7830/5ca3330a285e400782746e8.png[/img] *Whip/Dark Bow Coloring System 1. Whip Found [img]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/4337/952d29a168e246ab843d099.png[/img] 2. Dark Bow Found [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/603/bf1df9b22da548a9a1bc441.png[/img] 3. Colored Whip/Dark Bow [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/1138/01daf9d5f72c46cd98c84d8.png[/img] *Custom Skill Selection Task System [img]http://img85.imageshack.us/img85/4492/696146ebe98948678efa65e.png[/img] [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/8627/c642182dff054876851ea1f.png[/img] Task Token Exchange (Get tokens from tasks) [img]http://img580.imageshack.us/img580/7940/a96035282d804d69b6f9af6.png[/img] [img]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/1886/24a2d35bda5c47859b6f3c5.png[/img] There is also skill experience claim for the skill you pick to get experience for. But was to lazy to get pictures. *Gravestone system [img]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/1241/acc3e5a0f6c64b9fa02c304.png[/img] *Skillcape buying system [img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/4923/64c0a5f57f104163b85444a.png[/img] Skill selection [img]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/8696/194fe8545b2f4c069906d1b.png[/img] When clicking a skill, you buy a skillcape if you have that 99 and if the skill is finished. More pictures to come ______________________________________________________________ Well hope you guys join and try the server out at Decerpo. See you soon. Post comments and your suggestions in this thread.
Thanks, Decerpo Development Team.

item.title: Decerpo [639]
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

It is fine to post pictures and text of your development but it is not okay to post your website link. Please remove it. Feel free to advertise all you want at www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php but in server development staff members have to approve your website link.

Edit: Thanks for removing

Read full topic

item.title: Decerpo [639]
item.dc:creator: @Divini Divini
item.description:
@Divini wrote:

Hey guys,
Over these past few weeks Sam, Kevin, and I have been working on a new server. Decerpo has been coming out great and we are proud to announce the ALPHA beta for the server. Of course this is the beginning stages of the server and there are a few bugs here and there but the server becomes more stable by the day. The server is run on mySql and is fully integrated with the Decerpo forums for easy donating/voting and more. Now lets get to the features.
95% Nex, animation/graphics working.
85% Summoning, Beast of Burden and healing.
Whip/Dark Bow Coloring System
Gambling/Dicing
Dungeoneering System
Custom Skill Selection Task System
70% Hunting
100% Slayer/Runecrafting (Pouches)/Herblore/Fishing/Agility/Fletching/
Woodcutting/Firemaking/Smithing/Mining/etc.
Custom wyrm system
Full Bork/Rammernaut/Tormented Demons/Corp.
100% Clan chat with coin share/loot share
Fully working bone crushing.
Castle Wars and Duel Arena fully working. No glitches.
All trade dupes/glitches fixed.
All magic animations and graphics.
Perfect hybriding and combat.
Fully working gravestones.
Brand new skillcape buying system, never before seen.
15% Grand Exchange
Full Korasi special. Working godsword assembly system.
Working teleport tabs.

Feature that are coming to Decerpo
Summoning specials/scrolls/pouch creating.
Fully working Nex with minion spawning and battle crys.
PvP rank system and random drop generator toggle on/off
Experience locking/unlocking.
Nomad
Dungeoneering complexity system.
New map data and item dumps.
Stability of shops and economy. Price adjustments.
And much more.

Picture Time
*Beast of Burden

*Rammernaut and Korasi Special

*Nex

*Whip/Dark Bow Coloring System

  1. Whip Found
  2. Dark Bow Found
  3. Colored Whip/Dark Bow

    *Custom Skill Selection Task System


    Task Token Exchange (Get tokens from tasks)


    There is also skill experience claim for the skill you pick to get experience for. But was to lazy to get pictures.
    *Gravestone system

    *Skillcape buying system

    Skill selection

    When clicking a skill, you buy a skillcape if you have that 99 and if the skill is finished.
    More pictures to come

Well hope you guys join and try the server out at Decerpo. See you soon. Post comments and your suggestions in this thread.

Thanks,
Decerpo Development Team.
